channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: For 50 years, Rockalina the turtle lived on a kitchen floor. Now she has a new friend
item.description: The Oreo-sized baby turtle represents a turning point in Rockalina's recovery: Spending time with her own kind.

item.title: Trump touts his peace deals - but many are already unraveling
item.description: President Trump has been racing to rack up peace deals — but keeping them intact is proving far more difficult.

item.title: Republicans Defy Trump in Indiana, and Hundreds Quarantined in Measles Outbreak

item.description: Investment in manufacturing, infrastructure and property is expected to fall this year, a remarkable turn for an economy whose growth reshaped the wor...

item.title: Thailand Says Trump Call About Cambodia Conflict Is Set for Friday
item.description: President Trump’s planned intervention comes as the hostilities entered their fifth day and appeared to escalate, and while Thailand moves toward earl...

item.title: Amputees often feel disconnected from their bionic hands. AI could bridge the gap
item.description: Sensors and artificial intelligence help a prosthetic hand act more like a natural one, new research shows.

item.title: King Charles to Speak About His Cancer in Televised Message
item.description: A video of the king discussing his “recovery journey” will air on Channel 4 on Friday. He was diagnosed with an unspecified type of cancer last year.

item.title: Kilmar Abrego Garcia released from ICE custody. And, Indiana rejects redistricting

item.title: Thailand's Parliament is dissolved for new elections early next year
item.description: Thailand's Parliament was dissolved Friday for new elections early next year as the country engaged in deadly fighting with Cambodia.

item.title: Why Is It So Hard to Build Big Things?
item.description: Today we look at the state of American inertia.
